definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: Last year a case of shocking murder happened in the Politics and Law University of China.
sentences.chinese: 去年中国政法大学发生一起震惊的凶杀案。

sentences.english: The police cracked a murder case last week.
sentences.chinese: 警察上周侦破了一件凶杀案。

sentences.english: Murder at a famous art museum.
sentences.chinese: 讲的是在一个著名的艺术博物馆里发生的凶杀案。

sentences.english: The police are going into the murder case.
sentences.chinese: 警察正在调查这宗凶杀案。

sentences.english: The stabbing was the first slaying on campus since then.
sentences.chinese: 这次事件是自那时起的第一件凶杀案。

sentences.english: Bian Zhongyun's murder is of historical importance.
sentences.chinese: 卞仲耘凶杀案具有历史的重要性。

sentences.english: The murder was committed between a quarter to ten and the hour.
sentences.chinese: 凶杀案在九点四十五分至十点之间发生。

sentences.english: Police believe that the murder took place between 9 p. m and 1 a. m last night.
sentences.chinese: 警察确信这起凶杀案发生于昨晚9点到凌晨1点之间。

sentences.english: He is suspected as an accomplice of the murder.
sentences.chinese: 他涉嫌为这次凶杀案的同谋。

sentences.english: It is amazing that she should have said nothing about the murder.
sentences.chinese: 令人惊奇的是她竟然对这桩凶杀案不置一词。

sentences.english: Today there are more than 5, 000 homicides in Rio state each year.
sentences.chinese: 目前，每年里约州有5000多起凶杀案。

definition: murder as a crime of passion
to commit a crime or offence
